fw.name: OSMInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

enum.name: CatSceneType
enum.abstract: The different types of a new ProductScene scene.

method.name: Copy
method.abstract: Creates another Product-Scene from the current one with the possibility to have a different mode.

method.name: ExistsInScene
method.abstract: Returns whether the product has overloaded attributes in the Product-Scene.

method.name: GetSceneProductData
method.abstract: Returns the SceneProductData associated to the given product in the Product-Scene.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns the type of the Product-Scene.

class.name: ProductScenes
class.abstract: A collection of ProductScenes contained in a given ProductDocument.

method.name: AddProductSceneFull
method.abstract: Creates a new FULL scene from a set of products and adds it to the ProductScenes collection.

method.name: AddProductScenePartial
method.abstract: Creates a new DELTA scene from a set of products and adds it to the ProductScenes collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a scene using its index or its name from the ProductScenes collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a product-scene from the ProductScenes collection.

method.name: GetDefinition
method.abstract: Returns the product's definition.

method.name: GetDescription
method.abstract: Returns the product's description.

method.name: GetMasterShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Retrieves the product's master shape representation.

method.name: GetMove
method.abstract: Returns the product's move object.

method.name: GetNomenclature
method.abstract: Returns the product's nomenclature.

method.name: GetPartNumber
method.abstract: Returns the product's part number.

method.name: GetPosition
method.abstract: Returns the product's position object in the scene.

method.name: GetRevision
method.abstract: Returns the product's revision number.

method.name: GetSource
method.abstract: Returns the product's source.

method.name: HasAMasterShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Returns whether the product has a master shape representation in the scene.

method.name: UpgradeToFull
method.abstract: Create a ProductScene in Full mode from the current Scene.

method.name: UpgradeToPartial
method.abstract: Create a ProductScene in Partial mode from the current Scene.

class.name: SceneProductData
class.abstract:
The interface to access a CATIASceneProduct

Using this prefered syntax will enable mkdoc to document your class.

method.name: GetRealColor
method.abstract: Returns / Set the scene product's color and inheritance.

method.name: SetRealColor
method.abstract: Returns / Set the scene product's color and inheritance.

method.name: Activation
method.abstract: Returns / Set the scene product's activation state.

method.name: Hidden
method.abstract: Returns / Set the scene product's hide/show mode.

method.name: Move
method.abstract: Returns the scene product's move object.

method.name: Position
method.abstract: Returns the scene product's position object.

class.name: SceneWorkbench
class.abstract: Represent the access point to scenes management.

method.name: WorkScenes
method.abstract: Returns the Scenes collection.

class.name: Scenes
class.abstract: A collection of scenes contained in a given ProductDocument.

method.name: AddCopyScene
method.abstract: Creates a scene from another and adds it to the Scenes collection.

method.name: AddNewScene
method.abstract: Creates a scene from a product and adds it to the Scenes collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a scene from the Scenes collection.
